items.title: Final Anker SOLIX Xmas flash sale drops C2000 Gen 2 power station + alternator charger to new $969 low, more
items.summary:
As part of its full momentum Christmas Sale, Anker SOLIX has now launched a final 48-hour holiday flash sale through Christmas Eve with up to $5,299 savings across six offers. A notable standout amongst the crowd is the Anker SOLIX C2000 Gen 2 Portable Power Station bundled with an alternator charger at $969 shipped, which beats its Amazon pricing by $80. This station was just released back in October, with this particular bundle joining the lineup of various deals much later, and which we’ve seen brought down from its $2,098 full price to $1,049 at the lowest so far. For only two days, you can score a larger-than-ever 54% markdown that cuts $1,129 off the going rate for the lowest price we have tracked – or pick up the station on its own for nearly $300 less. Head below to learn more about this station and the other offers lasting through Christmas Eve at midnight.

more…

items.title: The US says it will take action against China's chip industry, setting new tariffs on chips from China from June 23, 2027; they have 0% duties currently (Akash Sriram/Reuters)
items.summary:
Akash Sriram / Reuters:
The US says it will take action against China's chip industry, setting new tariffs on chips from China from June 23, 2027; they have 0% duties currently  —  The Trump administration on Tuesday said it would slap tariffs on Chinese semiconductor imports starting in June, 2027 at a rate to be announced at least a month in advance.

items.title: ServiceNow agrees to acquire cybersecurity startup Armis for $7.75B, set to close in H2 2026, pending approvals; Insight acquired Armis in a $1.1B deal in 2020 (Bloomberg)
items.summary:
Bloomberg:
ServiceNow agrees to acquire cybersecurity startup Armis for $7.75B, set to close in H2 2026, pending approvals; Insight acquired Armis in a $1.1B deal in 2020  —  ServiceNow Inc. has reached a deal to buy the cybersecurity startup Armis in a deal valued at $7.75 billion, representing its largest acquisition to date.

Nothing’s 2025 CMF Buds 2a with ANC

Buy for $20 (Reg. $49)

What we love

These aren’t super high-end earbuds, but it’s hard to go wrong with them at $20. At this price, you’re getting ANC, Bluetooth 5.4, and 12.4mm drivers – essentially all the bells and whistles you’ll find on models that cost upwards of $100. Don’t miss this set while it’s 60% off the $49 list price.

Samsung is offering a giant discount on its Odyssey 55-inch Ark 2nd-gen 4K gaming monitor down to $1,249.99 shipped with a $50 FREE credit that applies during checkout. This is originally a $3,000 display that has lately been fetching $2,700. We’ve seen it to drop to the $1,400 mark in the past with some limited offers at Woot, but it’s currently fetching its lowest price, that too directly from Samsung. Amazon currently has it for $1,299.99 shipped without the additional $50 FREE credit, which makes Samsung’s Holiday offer worth considering today. It first hit this price last week as part of the brand’s Holiday sale, so you might want to snag it now as the offer may not last very long with the holiday deals starting to fade. Head below for more details along with deals on other Samsung monitors.
